Foreign Driver's License FAQ

When using a foreign driver's license in Japan, several procedures are required. Below are common questions.

Q1: Can I drive with a foreign license?

Yes, you need an international driving permit or convert to a Japanese license. The international permit is valid for one year.

Q2: How to convert to a Japanese license?

You need to go to the driver's license examination center in your prefecture. Required documents include: foreign license, translation certificate, passport, etc.
